text: Ara allahâ€Œ jibanopakarane tomadera madhye ka'uke karo upara sresthatba diyechena. Yaderake sresthatba deya hayeche tara tadera adhinastha dasadasiderake nijedera jibanopakarana hate emana kichu deya na yate tara e bisaye tadera samana haye yaya [1]. Tabe ki tara allahâ€Œra anugraha asbikara karache
